Blacknightmare:

"Then we should start" said the femme


  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: Kraftlos 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunda=
y, November 25, 2007 4:56 PM
  Subject: Atlantis - Picking Up The Pieces


=
  Lord Perseus helped the militia put out the last of the fires while Raven=
chief flew above the city taking pictures of the damage.  No one could keep=
 their mind of the battle which was going on just a few short miles away.

=
  Ravenchief glanced in the direction of the battle, but all he could see w=
as the faint cloud of sweeps which surrounded the island.  They felt horrib=
le that Rodimus and the Matrix were at stake, and there was nothing they co=
uld do. 

  "Perseus to all Maximals in Atlantis, I need to tend to our gue=
st.  Please make yourselves useful to the work crews, its going to be a lon=
g recovery." he said in a distant-sounding tone.

  Perseus approached the =
shield and glanced around the area for any enemies.  Salveo waited for the =
signal, then dropped the shield.  The doors opened and Perseus stepped insi=
de; Guardia took this opportunity to go out before the shield came back up.=
  A moment later the defenses were back in place. 

  Perseus walked down t=
he narrow corridor ramps, leading the the lowest level of the base.  At the=
 holding cells, he pushed a button on the panel next to battered blast door=
s and it slid open, revealing the completely trashed holding cell and secur=
ity office.  He continued to the dimly lit secondary cell and knocked on th=
e bars. 

  "Blacknightmare?  I apologize for making you wait so long.  We =
have some things we need to discuss." he said calmly.

  [TAG: Blacknightma=
re, Maximals in Atlantis]
